rule.name: AS_QNM_UT_setTemplateQuestionsDataOnUpdate
rule.description: Sets the group and order number for questions that are impacted on update

el.a:name: New question, with precedents, no bumping

a:expectedOutput.a:value: append( #"_a-0000e4b1-2fbc-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_870515"().questions, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_T_Question'( questionTemplateId: 100, questionCategoryTemplateId: - 1, groupNumber: 2, orderNumber: 2, isDisplayedPrecedentSets: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_T_QuestionPrecedentSet'( questionPrecedents: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_T_QuestionPrecedent'( questionTemplateId_precedent: - 1 ) ) ) )
